transform.calculate: if((datum.Result < datum.Mean && datum.Prior1Row < datum.Mean) || (datum.Result > datum.Mean && datum.Prior1Row > datum.Mean) || (datum.Result == datum.Mean && datum.Prior1Row == datum.Mean), 0, 1)
if(datum.Result >= datum.Prior1Row && isValid(datum.Prior1Row), 1, if(datum.Result <= datum.Following1Row && isValid(datum.Following1Row), 1, 0))
if(datum.Result <= datum.Prior1Row && isValid(datum.Prior1Row), 1, if(datum.Result >= datum.Following1Row && isValid(datum.Following1Row), 1, 0))

if((datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && (datum.OutsideUCL == 1 || datum.UCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma == 1 || (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result > datum.Mean) || datum.TrendUpThreshold == 1)) || (datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && (datum.OutsideLCL == 1 || datum.LCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma == 1 || (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result < datum.Mean) || datum.TrendDownThreshold == 1)), 1, 0)

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(datum.IsImprovement == 1 && datum.IsConcern == 1 && SplitMarkers == true, 'Concern', datum.PrimarySPCCategory), 'NA')

if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.OutsideUCL == 1, ' It is an astronomical point.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.OutsideLCL, ' It is an astronomical point.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.UCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma == 1, ' It is in a group close to the two sigma boundary.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.LCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma, ' It is in a group close to the two sigma boundary.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.TrendUpThreshold == 1, ' It is part of a group of ' + datum.TrendUpScore + ' points trending up.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.TrendDownThreshold, ' It is part of a group of ' + datum.TrendDownScore + ' points trending down.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result > datum.Mean), ' It is part of a run of ' + datum.MeanScore + ' points above the mean.', '')+ if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result < datum.Mean), ' It is part of a run of ' + datum.MeanScore + ' points below the mean.', '')

if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.OutsideUCL == 1, ' It is an astronomical point.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.OutsideLCL, ' It is an astronomical point.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.UCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma == 1, ' It is in a group close to the two sigma boundary.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.LCLTwoOfThreeBeyondTwoSigma, ' It is in a group close to the two sigma boundary.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && datum.TrendUpThreshold == 1, ' It is part of a group of ' + datum.TrendUpGroup + ' points trending up.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && datum.TrendDownThreshold, ' It is part of a group of ' + datum.TrendDownScore + ' points trending down.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low' && (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result > datum.Mean), ' It is part of a run of ' + datum.MeanScore + ' points above the mean.', '') + if(datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High' && (datum.MeanScore >= MeanGroupSizeThreshold && datum.Result < datum.Mean), ' It is part of a run of ' + datum.MeanScore + ' points below the mean.', '')

' + datum.ImprovementComments + ' ' + datum.ConcernComments, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Improvement', 'This data point shows improvement. ' + datum.ImprovementComments, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Concern', 'Datapoint is of concern. ' + datum.ConcernComments, 'Datapoint is of common cause.'))), 'Too few data points for an SPC.')

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(datum.RowReverseOrder == 1, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Common Cause', SPCImageCommonCause, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Concern' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', SPCImageConcernHigh, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Concern' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', SPCImageConcernLow, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Improvement' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', SPCImageImprovementHigh, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Improvement' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', SPCImageImprovementLow, null))))) , null), SPCImageNotEnoughDataPoints)

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(datum.RowReverseOrder == 1, if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Common Cause', 'Common Cause', if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Concern' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', 'Concern (High)', if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Concern' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', 'Concern (Low)', if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Improvement' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', 'Improvement (High)', if(datum.PrimarySPCCategory == 'Improvement' && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', 'Improvement (Low)', null))))) , null), 'Too few datapoints for an SPC.')

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(isValid(datum.Target), if(datum.Target >= datum.LCL && datum.Target <= datum.UCL, 'Unreliable', if(datum.Target > datum.UCL && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', 'Not capable', if(datum.Target < datum.LCL && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', 'Not capable', if(datum.Target < datum.LCL && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'High', 'Capable', if(datum.Target > datum.UCL && datum.ImprovementDirection == 'Low', 'Capable', 'Unknown'))))), 'No Target'), 'Too few datapoints for an SPC.')

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(datum.RowReverseOrder == 1, if(datum.Capability == 'Unreliable', SPCImageInconsistent, if(datum.Capability == 'Not capable', SPCImageFailing, if(datum.Capability == 'Capable', SPCImagePassing, SPCImageNoTarget))), null), SPCImageNotEnoughDataPoints)

if(datum.IsMinimumDataPoints == 1, if(datum.RowReverseOrder == 1, if(datum.Capability == 'Unreliable', 'The target is expected to hit some of the time but normal variation would cause the target to be missed too.', if(datum.Capability == 'Not capable', 'The target is currently unattainable without a change in process.', if(datum.Capability == 'Capable', 'The target is expected to hit all of the time.', 'There is no target.'))), null), 'Too few datapoints for an SPC.')
